info.name: Dark Twitter Background & Remove Moments Tab
info.description:
Makes twitter dashboard background dark. 
Removes the 'Moments' tab from dashboard.
info.additionalInfo:
Change Log
- 2017.06.15 – Changed 'body:not(.edge-design)' color back to 'body' to fit with more of twitter's updates
- 2017.06.14 – Changed 'body' color to 'body:not(.edge-design)' to fit with twitter's updates
